ctx: intros m k z Hmap Hsucc.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap k : dim z : dart Hmap : inv_hmap m Hsucc : A m k z <> nil Unable to unify "A m k z <> nil" with "(fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \\/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end) m z".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
succ_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {succ m k x} + {~ succ m k x}
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
pred_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {pred m k x} + {~ pred m k x}
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z then cA_1 m0 k y else cA_1 m...
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m0 k x) z then cA_1 m0 k y else cA_...
pred = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A_1 m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Nat.lt_exists_pred : forall z n : nat, (z < n)%nat -> exists k : nat, n = S k /\ (z <= k)%nat
exd_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), {exd m x} + {~ exd m x}
not_exd_nil : forall m : fmap, inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m nil
Z.lt_exists_pred : forall z n : Z, z < n -> exists k : Z, n = Z.succ k /\ z <= k
prec_I = fun (m : fmap) (x : dart) => x <> nil /\ ~ exd m x : fmap -> dart -> Prop
A_1 = fix A_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A_1 m0 k y | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then x0 else A_1 m0 k y else A_1 m0 k y end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
Z.lt_succ_pred : forall z n : Z, z < n -> Z.succ (Z.pred n) = n
B_1 = fix B_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B_1 m0 k y) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then m0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 else L (B_1 m0 k y) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
fmap_rec : forall P : fmap -> Set, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
fmap_ind : forall P : fmap -> Prop, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
fmap_rect : forall P : fmap -> Type, P V -> (forall f0 : fmap, P f0 -> forall (d : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), P (I f0 d t p)) -> (forall f1 : fmap, P f1 -> forall (d : dim) (d0 d1 : dart), P (L f1 d d0 d1)) -> forall f2 : fmap, P f2
Nat.min_r : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Nat.min n m = m
Nat.max_l : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Nat.max n m = n
leb_complete : forall m n : nat, (m <=? n)%nat = true -> (m <= n)%nat
Z.lt_ind : forall A : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : Z, A (Z.succ n) -> (forall m : Z, n < m -> A m -> A (Z.succ m)) -> forall m : Z, n < m -> A m
lt_wf_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, (m < n0)%nat -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
ARmul_assoc : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z)
ARmul_assoc1 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (rmul x y) z) (rmul (rmul y z) x)
BinPosDef.Pos.sub = fun x y : positive => match BinPosDef.Pos.sub_mask x y with | BinPosDef.Pos.IsPos z => z | _ => 1%positive end : positive -> positive -> positive Argument scopes are [positive_scope positive_scope]
BinIntDef.Z.to_pos = fun z : Z => match z with | Z.pos p => p | _ => 1%positive end : Z -> positive Argument scope is [Z_scope]
Nat.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat -> (m <= p)%nat -> (n < p)%nat
N.shiftl_spec_low : forall a n m : N, (m < n)%N -> N.testbit (N.shiftl a n) m = false
ARmul_assoc2 : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y z : R, req (rmul (rmul y x) z) (rmul (rmul y z) x)
leb_complete_conv : forall m n : nat, (n <=? m)%nat = false -> (m < n)%nat
leb_correct_conv : forall m n : nat, (m < n)%nat -> (n <=? m)%nat = false
BinIntDef.Z.even = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 | Z.pos (_~0)%positive | Z.neg (_~0)%positive => true | _ => false end : Z -> bool Argument scope is [Z_scope]
N.shiftl_spec_high' : forall a n m : N, (n <= m)%N -> N.testbit (N.shiftl a n) m = N.testbit a (m - n)
IZR = fun z : Z => match z with | 0 => R0 | Z.pos n => IPR n | Z.neg n => (- IPR n)%R end : Z -> R Argument scope is [Z_scope]
Z.max_r : forall n m : Z, n <= m -> Z.max n m = m
Z.min_r : forall n m : Z, m <= n -> Z.min n m = m
Nat.max_r : forall n m : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> Nat.max n m = m

```intros m k z Hmap Hsucc.
unfold succ in Hsucc.
unfold exd.
rewrite -> Hmap.
apply Hsucc.```
